channel.title: Newpaper reader/kindle like device [WIP]
channel.description:
Haven't modelled in like a year, thought I'd try out ma skills, turned out to be the cleanest model I've ever made.
I designed it myself for a college project, but I thought I'd go the whole way and just make a 3d photorealistic render. It's not much at the moment but I'll have it done within a week or so.
Think I finally got the hang of good topology, that's what I'm really looking for in this model :)
The original blueprints I sketched:
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/213/newspaperdevice.jpg/][IMG]http://img213.imageshack.us/img213/3/newspaperdevice.th.jpg[/img][/URL]
Unsmoothed model:
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/703/52387284.jpg/][IMG]http://img703.imageshack.us/img703/3872/52387284.th.jpg[/img][/URL]
Turbosmoothed:
[IMG]http://img11.imageshack.us/img11/8987/98293622.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://img718.imageshack.us/img718/6696/65222714.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://img717.imageshack.us/img717/369/42106416.jpg[/img]
